short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI {You} for you to be everywhere

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Ekai, the future of workplace collaboration. Ekai adds focus hour to your day and reduces query resolution time by responding on your behalf from the information added by you to it. 


Elevate Your Context with Ekai
1. Automated Meeting Bot: Ekai can be added to your Google meet to capture the discussions happening during the meeting, Generate a text transcript for the meeting
2. Add to Ekai: You can add this meeting transcript to your ekai and ask questions regarding the meeting on Slack.

3. User can easily track history of the ongoing meeting and historical meetings as well.

Have questions? 
Please write us at: tech@yourekai.com
